summary: Depicts the intense and fractured relationship between a lonely teenager and a beautiful stranger.
cast: Eleanor Tomlinson|Stephen Rea|Jules Willcox|Erika Marozsán|Katie Silverman|Julia Pietrucha|Jacek Lenartowicz|Miklós Székely B.|László Kádár|Gerda Pikali|Morena Abellar Duwe|Claire Castillo|Jeanette Jordana|Leah Castillo|Barbara Gal|Laszlo More|Nina Pöllönen|Márk Kun|Sándor Tüzkö|Dora Bekesi|Seren Back
title: Styria
